text: The Morning Journal is a daily newspaper based in Lorain, Ohio. Originally the Lorain Journal, it was an afternoon paper which was historically more popular in an industrial town like Lorain, but switched to morning publication in the 1980s. It is the primary paper in the city of Lorain, but also serves the wider area of Lorain, Erie, and Huron counties, and the western Cleveland suburbs.Title bar of The Morning Journal website: "Morning Journal: Serving Lorain, Erie, Huron and western Cuyahoga counties". Retrieved 2009-07-29. == See also == * Lorain Journal Co. v. United States of 1951 * Milkovich v.
